title: Phase 2b: Port leaf sub-types batch 1 to TypeScript (9 types)
body:
## Overview

Port 9 leaf sub-types from PHP to TypeScript. These types have no dependencies on other schema types — they are the foundation that parent types will build on.

## Reference

- **PHP source**: `php/src/v1/Schema/` (see individual files below)
- **TS conventions**: `AGENTS-ts.md`
- **TS skill**: `.claude/skills/ts-schema-implementation/SKILL.md`
- **Existing TS example**: `ts/src/schema/Brand.ts`

## Types to implement

All files go in `ts/src/schema/`. Tests go in `ts/test/schema/`.

### 1. `PostalAddress.ts` — OPTIONS OBJECT pattern (6 optional properties)

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/PostalAddress.php`

Properties (all optional):
- `streetAddress: string | null`
- `addressLocality: string | null`
- `addressRegion: string | null`
- `postalCode: string | null`
- `addressCountry: string | null`
- `postOfficeBoxNumber: string | null`

This type has 6 optional properties (>5 threshold), so use the options object constructor pattern with `PostalAddressOptions` interface.

schemaType: `'PostalAddress'`

### 2. `GeoCoordinates.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/GeoCoordinates.php`

Properties (all required):
- `latitude: number` (required)
- `longitude: number` (required)

schemaType: `'GeoCoordinates'`

### 3. `GeoShape.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/GeoShape.php`

Properties:
- `box: string | null` (optional, default null)

schemaType: `'GeoShape'`

### 4. `AdministrativeArea.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/AdministrativeArea.php`

Properties:
- `name: string` (required)

schemaType: `'AdministrativeArea'`

### 5. `MonetaryAmount.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/MonetaryAmount.php`

Properties:
- `currency: string` (required)
- `value: number | null` (optional, default null)
- `minValue: number | null` (optional, default null)
- `maxValue: number | null` (optional, default null)
- `unitText: string | null` (optional, default null)

4 optional properties → positional constructor.

schemaType: `'MonetaryAmount'`

### 6. `QuantitativeValue.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/QuantitativeValue.php`

Properties:
- `value: number | null` (optional, default null)
- `unitCode: string | null` (optional, default null)
- `minValue: number | null` (optional, default null)
- `maxValue: number | null` (optional, default null)

4 optional properties → positional constructor.

schemaType: `'QuantitativeValue'`

### 7. `Rating.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/Rating.php`

Properties:
- `ratingValue: number` (required)
- `bestRating: number | null` (optional, default null)
- `worstRating: number | null` (optional, default null)

schemaType: `'Rating'`

### 8. `ContactPoint.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/ContactPoint.php`

Properties (all optional):
- `telephone: string | null` (optional, default null)
- `email: string | null` (optional, default null)
- `contactType: string | null` (optional, default null)
- `areaServed: string | null` (optional, default null)
- `availableLanguage: string | null` (optional, default null)

5 optional properties → positional constructor (≤5 threshold).

schemaType: `'ContactPoint'`

### 9. `PropertyValue.ts` — positional constructor

PHP ref: `php/src/v1/Schema/PropertyValue.php`

Properties:
- `name: string` (required)
- `value: string` (required)

schemaType: `'PropertyValue'`

## Testing

Create one test file per type in `ts/test/schema/`. Use TDD: write failing tests first, then implement.

Each test file must cover:
1. **Minimal construction** — only required properties, verify `@context`, `@type`, required fields
2. **Null omission** — optional properties when null do NOT appear in JSON output
3. **Full construction** — all properties set, verify they all appear
4. **PHP parity** — JSON-LD output should match the PHP version for the same inputs

## Barrel exports

Update `ts/src/index.ts` to export all 9 new types. Keep exports sorted alphabetically.

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] All 9 schema class files created in `ts/src/schema/`
- [ ] PostalAddress uses options object constructor (6 optional > 5 threshold)
- [ ] All other types use positional constructor
- [ ] Property names match PHP exactly
- [ ] Test file for each type in `ts/test/schema/`
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm run test`)
- [ ] Biome passes (`npx biome check`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] `index.ts` updated with all new exports
- [ ] No modifications to `JsonLdGenerator.ts` or `TypedSchema.ts`
- [ ] No `any` types used
